Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp(n)

programme.title: The Watcher in the Woods
programme.desc: Two sisters are haunted by a ghost when they and their American family move into an old mansion set deep in an English forest. As the spirit makes more and more contact with them, the girls come to realise that the spirit is the ghost of the owner's child who went missing long ago. Thriller, starring Bette Davis, Carroll Baker, David McCallum and Lynn-Holly Johnson(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth

programme.title: Garfield: A Tale of Two Kitties
programme.desc: The lazy moggy stows away in his owner's luggage and ends up in London. He is promptly mistaken for an English upper-class cat, who has recently inherited a grand estate, and moves into his stately home - much to the dismay of the real aristocratic feline's conniving relation, who is bent on swindling him out of his money. Family comedy, starring Breckin Meyer, Billy Connolly and Jennifer Love Hewitt, with the voices of Bill Murray and Tim Curry

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: A girl grows up in 16th-century Europe under the iron fist of her stepmother, until the love of handsome Prince Henry offers a glimmer of hope. Unfortunately, the royal gent has worries of his own in the shape of an arranged marriage. Luckily, Renaissance genius Leonardo da Vinci is on hand to play fairy godfather and bring the pair together. Romantic drama, starring Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott and Timothy West

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement

programme.title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: A girl grows up in 16th-century Europe under the iron fist of her stepmother, until the love of handsome Prince Henry offers a glimmer of hope. Unfortunately, the royal gent has worries of his own in the shape of an arranged marriage. Luckily, Renaissance genius Leonardo da Vinci is on hand to play fairy godfather and bring the pair together. Romantic drama, starring Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott and Timothy West

programme.title: The Jungle Book: Special
programme.desc: The making of Jon Favreau's reimagining of the Disney classic, featuring the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Scarlett Johanssen

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town singer creates a bold alternate identity for herself, and records a music video. The song becomes an internet sensation and she soon finds her alter ego becoming a huge star - but risks losing touch with the things that matter the most to her. Drama based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Aubrey Peeples, Stefanie Scott and Molly Ringwald

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: A 12-year-old orphan is abducted and taken away to a magical land by a band of pirates, who need child labour to mine a magical substance created by fairies. He escapes, joining forces with a roguish adventurer, and goes in search of the truth about his mother and his own destiny. Fantasy adventure prequel to Peter Pan, starring Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms

Drama based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Aubrey Peeples, Stefanie Scott and Molly Ringwald

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: A 12-year-old orphan is abducted and taken away to a magical land by a band of pirates, who need child labour to mine a magical substance created by fairies. He escapes, joining forces with a roguish adventurer, and goes in search of the truth about his mother and his own destiny. Fantasy adventure prequel to Peter Pan, starring Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: The fur flies when a pampered California pooch is sent to live with a wise cracking farm hound. However, when a couple of bumbling thieves attempt to break into their home, they must put aside their differences to defend their home. Family comedy, starring Joris Jarsky, Ryan Belleville and Dylan Schmid

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson(n)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley(n)

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher(n)

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice(n)

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail
programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. He meets a magical white wolf, who leads him on a journey in search of a magician who can help them find a powerful warrior - but many danger's lie between them and the sorcerer's mountain home. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Milla Jovovich, Whoopi Goldberg and Sharon Stone(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee(n)

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: A race of strange, babbling yellow creatures has served the cause of evil throughout the history of the world. In the 1960s, three of these eternal henchmen get a job working for a criminal genius who is hatching a plot against the British crown - but while carrying out her orders, they uncover a threat to their whole species. Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton(n)

programme.title: Friday Download: The Movie
programme.desc: A group of teenagers on a road trip breaks down in the middle of nowhere, and finds assistance is in short supply. The friends seek shelter in a spooky mansion, but they quickly discover there is more to their refuge than meets the eye. Comedy based on the children's TV series, starring Tyger Drew-Honey and Shannon Flynn(n)

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail

Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Uncompromising detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan hunts the ringleaders behind a bizarre death lottery which is seemingly being used to murder well-known figures. The case becomes personal when he discovers his own name is on the list of prospective victims. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Patricia Clarkson, Liam Neeson and an early appearance by Jim Carrey

programme.title: Deadly Sisters
programme.desc: Two sisters tire of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, and plot to kill her. Thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Georgie Henley and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall

programme.title: Kite
programme.desc: A teenager living in a corrupt society dominated by violent street gangs swears revenge when her parents are murdered. Joining forces with her father's former partner on the police force, she journeys into the depths of the criminal underworld to learn the killers' identities. Crime thriller, starring India Eisley and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The captain of Russia's first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelow's fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl

programme.title: Captive
programme.desc: A fugitive fleeing from a police manhunt is desperate to see his newborn son. Needing a hiding place, he takes a recovering meth addict hostage in her own home. The pair make an unlikely connection as they bond over finding ways to cope with the challenges in their lives. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Mara and David Oyelowo

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agent's nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersen's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Two supermarket checkout girls covering for their friends on Christmas Eve get drawn into a drugs sting and are forced to cross a dealer to save themselves. Their absent colleagues endure a disastrous night's gambling in Las Vegas, while two men forced to take part in the sting find themselves spending a festive night with a narcotics agent. Drama, starring Katie Holmes, William Fichtner and JE Freeman

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: Freezer
programme.desc: Wisecracking ex-con Robert is kidnapped and held hostage in a walk-in freezer by Russian thugs, who are convinced he has $8million from them. As he struggles to fight back against the cold, he soon discovers he is not alone. Thriller, starring Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: A narcotics cop learns a small-time crook has been released from prison and goes behind the chief of police's back to organise a disproportionate manhunt for him. As his methods grow increasingly brutal, he comes closer to learning a secret from his own past. Detective drama, starring David Morse and Cory Monteith, in his final film role

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A washed-up former hostage negotiator returns to regular police work, but later finds himself forced to draw on his old skills in a bid to save a crooked accountant's children, who have been taken prisoner in their own home by a gang of psychotic delinquents. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Ben Foster and Jonathan Tucker

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis(n)

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: A narcotics cop learns a small-time crook has been released from prison and goes behind the chief of police's back to organise a disproportionate manhunt for him. As his methods grow increasingly brutal, he comes closer to learning a secret from his own past. Detective drama, starring David Morse and Cory Monteith, in his final film role(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner(n)

programme.title: Mojave
programme.desc: A suicidal artist drives into the desert seeking solitude, hoping to find some meaning in his shallow life. He meets a mysterious drifter who throws his life off course, and must find a way to conquer his depression in order to protect the things he cares about. Thriller, starring Oscar Isaac, Garrett Hedlund and Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: An imprisoned art thief and forger learns that his son is dying, and applies for early release. While his request is granted, he learns that the shady characters who granted his freedom want him to assist them in a daring heist, leaving him torn between carrying out the robbery and making his son's last wishes come true. Crime thriller, starring John Travolta and Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons
programme.desc: Two brothers living in New York's Chinatown in the 1980s rise quickly through the ranks of a local gang. When their organisation clashes with a rival, the siblings are targeted by a hard-bitten cop who is determined to clean up the streets. Crime drama, starring Ray Liotta, Justin Chon and Kevin Wu(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan(n)

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a white supremacist movement to prevent their planned terrorist attack. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Toni Collette(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson(n)

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace(n)

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a white supremacist movement to prevent their planned terrorist attack. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Toni Collette(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly travels to the 21st century, where he has to save his children from a terrible fate. However, this proves to have unforeseen consequences when the future version of arch enemy Biff sees a chance to rewrite history for his own benefit, leaving Marty stuck in a twisted parallel universe. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton

programme.title: Into the Forest
programme.desc: An unexplained cataclysm devastates the world, rendering virtually all technology useless. Two teenage sisters living in the backwoods face a series of challenges as they struggle to survive in a world changed beyond all recognition. Sci-fi drama based on Jean Hegland's novel, starring Ellen Page and Evan Rachel Wood

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A reclusive genius creates a boy but dies before completing him, leaving his brainchild with scissor-like blades in place of hands. A kindly woman from a nearby suburb takes pity on the lonely figure and welcomes him into her home. He quickly becomes a hit in the neighbourhood - but then his new friends start to turn against him. Tim Burton's fantasy, starring Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest and Vincent Price

programme.title: Anguish
programme.desc: A teenage girl has struggled with mental health issues all her life, experiencing anxiety attacks and hallucinations. She discovers that her condition may be the result of a spirit possessing her - a revelation that leaves her forced to choose whether to allow the entity to take her over utterly or to fight to keep it under control. Horror, starring Ryan Simpkins and Annika Marks

programme.title: Friend Request
programme.desc: A teenager meets a girl online, only to find she is a demonic entity intent on killing her real friends. Horror, starring Alycia Debnam-Carey and William Moseley

programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. Sci-fi drama based on Jean Hegland's novel, starring Ellen Page and Evan Rachel Wood

programme.title: Hacked
programme.desc: A student watches a video of a murder on the internet, but the police refuse to believe the events in the film are real. She sets out to prove someone really has been killed, only to find herself trapped in a deadly game and in danger of becoming the murderer's next target. Thriller, starring Melanie Papalia and David Schlachtenhaufen

programme.title: Friend Request
programme.desc: A teenager meets a girl online, only to find she is a demonic entity intent on killing her real friends. Horror, starring Alycia Debnam-Carey and William Moseley

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: The tyrannical Ivan Ooze is accidentally released from his super-secure prison by dim-witted construction workers after 6,000 years in captivity. Vowing to conquer the Earth, he unleashes a reign of terror on Los Angeles - leaving the colour-coded champions fighting to save the world from his evil clutches. Sci-fi adventure, starring Paul Freeman, David Yost, Jason David Frank, Steve Cardenas, Karan Ashley and Johnny Yong Bosch

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: A dull American town in the middle of the desert is suddenly attacked by huge man-eating subterranean creatures. Luckily, two dimwitted but brave handymen step into the breach to lead a ragtag bunch of locals and a mismatched pair of survivalists in the battle against the gruesome worm-like monsters. Comedy horror, with Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross, Reba McEntire and Bobby Jacoby

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Billionaire Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice, consumed with rage over his parents' murder. Trained by a secret society, he hones his fighting skills and returns to his home city of Gotham on a mission to rid it of crime and corruption in the guise of a masked vigilante. Comic-book adventure, exploring the origins of the Dark Knight, with Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Cillian Murphy, Gary Oldman and Katie Holmes

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson

programme.title: The Greasy Strangler
programme.desc: A tour guide competes with his son for the love of a woman as a murderer terrorises their neighbourhood. Comedy horror, starring Michael St Michaels and Sky Elobar

programme.title: Darling
programme.desc: A woman takes a job housesitting a mansion that has a grisly history. Alone in the building, she begins to suffer a series of terrifying visions and is left unable to tell whether she is descending into madness or if there really is a supernatural force at work. Horror, starring Lauren Ashley Carter and Sean Young(n)

programme.desc: The tyrannical Ivan Ooze is accidentally released from his super-secure prison by dim-witted construction workers after 6,000 years in captivity. Vowing to conquer the Earth, he unleashes a reign of terror on Los Angeles - leaving the colour-coded champions fighting to save the world from his evil clutches. Sci-fi adventure, starring Paul Freeman, David Yost, Jason David Frank, Steve Cardenas, Karan Ashley and Johnny Yong Bosch(n)

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: A mysterious signal is transmitted to every mobile phone in the world, causing those who hear it to turn into bloodthirsty maniacs. A writer who was unaffected by the transmission bands together with a few other survivors to track down his family and unlock the mystery behind the crisis. Sci-fi thriller based on Stephen King's novel, starring John Cusack and Samuel L Jackson(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: A boy brings five mysterious stones back from a holiday, which attract supernatural forces that terrorise his family. Horror, starring Kevin Bacon and Radha Mitchell(n)

programme.title: Attack Of The Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: Trapped snowboarders fight for their lives when hordes of the undead terrorise a remote ski resort. Horror-comedy, starring Laurie Calvert, Gabriela Marcinkova and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese(n)

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: A mysterious signal is transmitted to every mobile phone in the world, causing those who hear it to turn into bloodthirsty maniacs. A writer who was unaffected by the transmission bands together with a few other survivors to track down his family and unlock the mystery behind the crisis. Sci-fi thriller based on Stephen King's novel, starring John Cusack and Samuel L Jackson(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: A boy brings five mysterious stones back from a holiday, which attract supernatural forces that terrorise his family. Horror, starring Kevin Bacon and Radha Mitchell(n)

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: A TV actor shuffles through life emotionally numbed by the drugs prescribed for him by his stern psychiatrist father. However, he decides to ditch the pills when returning home for his mother's funeral. Free of medication, his apathy begins to lift, and an eccentric local woman reawakens his joy for life. Romantic drama, written, directed by and starring Zach Braff, with Natalie Portman and Ian Holm

programme.title: Valley of Love
programme.desc: An estranged couple meet for the first time in years in Death Valley, California, having responded to a message left for them by their dead son, who committed suicide six months previously. They are instructed to visit a series of locations in the desert, with the promise that their son's ghost will appear to them. Drama, starring Isabelle Huppert and Gerard Depardieu. In French and English

programme.title: Honeytrap
programme.desc: A Brixton teenager's misguided attempts to attract the attention of a heartless wannabe rapper have terrible results. Drama, starring Jessica Sula, Lucien Laviscount and Ntonga Mwanza

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai

programme.title: Journey to the Shore
programme.desc: A wife's husband returns to her three years after he drowned at sea, and she agrees to let him take her on a journey. Drama, starring Eri Fukatsu and Tadanobu Asano

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara

programme.title: Summertime
programme.desc: An ambitious farmer's daughter travels to Paris in 1971, where she falls in love with a radical feminist. She finds herself obliged to return to the family farm, and her new lover accompanies her on the journey, but their relationship is greeted with disapproval. Romantic drama, starring Cecile De France and Izia Higelin. In French

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A bored millionaire masterminds a bank robbery, only to find himself pursued by a glamorous insurance investigator determined to prove his guilt. It is not long before they get embroiled in a passionate affair - but conflicting interests mean they can never really trust one another. Crime drama, starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Paul Burke and Yaphet Kotto

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: An American writer and his wife arrive in a picturesque French seaside town in France, their marriage in the middle of a crisis. They form friendships with locals and fellow visitors, while trying to repair the cracks in their relationship. Drama, directed by and starring Angelina Jolie, with Brad Pitt and Melanie Laurent

programme.title: Goat
programme.desc: New college student Brad is desperate to fit into his new surroundings, so taking a cue from his older brother, he decides to pledge a fraternity. All goes well at first as he attends parties and meets several girls, but as he enters into the final stretch of the pledging ritual-known as hell week, Brad finds things taking a violent turn as he has to endure a series of brutal initiation rituals. Fact-based drama, with Ben Schnetzer and Nick Jonas

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss ends up at an isolated motel, where the owner's curious relationship with his domineering mother results in murder. Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: An Elvis-obsessed ex-con and his lover set off on a nightmarish journey across America pursued by a variety of bizarre and deadly characters. David Lynch's dark road movie, starring Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Diane Ladd, Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart

programme.title: Down Dog
programme.desc: A sex-obsessed Lothario neglects his awkward teenage son, until he is tricked into believing he only has a year to live. Comedy, starring Jason Durr, Nick Moran and Orla O'Rourke

programme.title: Gentlemen
programme.desc: A terrified young writer hides in a Stockholm apartment, where he writes the story of its missing inhabitants, the flamboyant, charismatic Morgan brothers. Swedish thriller, starrring David Dencik, Sverrir Gudnason and David Fukamachi Regnfors

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A husband and wife take a yachting trip to help recover from the death of their son. While out on the open water the couple spot a sinking ship and manage to save the only person left on board - but they come to bitterly regret their good deed when the situation turns dark and a fraught battle of wits ensues. Thriller, based on a novel by Charles Williams, with Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman and Billy Zane

programme.title: Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed
programme.desc: An English teacher in Spain picks up two hitchhikers on his quest to meet John Lennon. Comedy drama set in 1966, starring Javier Camara, Natalia de Molina and Francesc Colomer

programme.title: The Spirit of St Louis
programme.desc: Biopic of pioneering aviator Charles Lindbergh, who began his career flying airmail for the Army, before designing and constructing a plane for a non-stop solo flight from New York to Paris in 1927. As he sets off on his dangerous journey, he looks back over his past experiences in the air. Starring James Stewart, Murray Hamilton, Patricia Smith and Marc Connelly

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: A young street artist's plan to move to London is put on hold when her mother and grandmother face eviction. Musical, starring Kinga Preis, Eliza Rycembel, Stanislawa Celinska and Sebastian Fabijanski

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A talented thief uses hi-tech devices to enter other people's dreams so he can steal their secrets. An industrialist hires him to perform a far more challenging job - to implant an idea into a corporate heir's mind, so he will think it is his own. However, the mission is compromised by the thief's own troubled psyche. Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tom Hardy

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Ageing outlaws, bound by a private code of honour and friendship, find themselves at odds with early 20th-century society, and come to realise their era has passed. Hired to steal guns for a tyrannical Mexican general, they instead decide to turn against him. Sam Peckinpah's Western, starring William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Warren Oates, Strother Martin and Edmond O'Brien(n)

programme.title: Northwest
programme.desc: A teenage burglar uses his ill-gotten gains to support his mother and younger brother. Longing for a more profitable line of work, he gets involved with a gangster, but soon he and his sibling are in over their heads as they are drawn into a world of drugs and prostitution. Crime drama, starring real-life brothers Gustav and Oscar Dyekjaer Giese. In Danish(n)

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton(n)

programme.title: The Hour of the Lynx
programme.desc: A disturbed young man committed to a psychiatric ward after murdering a couple tries to kill himself while ranting about God. A scientist aiding his treatment seeks the help of a priest in uncovering the roots of his psychosis, a process complicated by the clash of their personal ideologies. Drama, starring Sofie Grabol and Soren Malling. In Danish and Swedish(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a break-up receives an unexpected visit from her granddaughter, who desperately needs to raise $600 before the end of the day. They visit a series of old contacts in search of a loan, which leads to long-buried secrets coming to light. Comedy drama, starring Lily Tomlin and Julia Garner(n)

programme.title: Stations of the Cross
programme.desc: A girl from a strict Catholic family is an outsider in her secular school, and faces constant reproach from her fundamentalist mother. Under the tuition of a misguided priest, she pushes herself to extreme acts of self-sacrifice in her pursuit of spiritual redemption. Drama, starring Lea van Acken and Florian Stetter. In German, French and Latin(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Two middle-aged men embark on a wine-tasting tour in California a week before one of them is due to be married. The groom-to-be is determined to persuade his self-hating, embittered friend to loosen up - while also making it clear he intends to cheat on his fiancee before the week is out. Comedy, starring Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen and Sandra Oh(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: A German tank commander is assigned to lead a surprise counter-attack against Allied forces as part of a last-ditch attempt to turn the tide of the Second World War and prevent the invasion of his country. An American intelligence officer realises what the enemy is planning, and tries to convince his superiors that they are facing a major offensive. Drama, starring Robert Shaw, Henry Fonda, Dana Andrews, Telly Savalas and Charles Bronson(n)

programme.title: The Commune
programme.desc: A couple establish a commune in a large house in 1970s Copenhagen, encouraging anyone who wants to escape the outside world to join them and their daughter. A succession of unusual characters pass through the collective, but their supposed utopia looks set to be torn apart by an affair within the group. Drama, starring Ulrich Thomsen and Fares Fares. In Danish(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes(n)

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: A Mob boss watches as his empire crumbles around him after he refuses to have his girlfriend's brother killed. A disgruntled henchman responds by heading up a breakaway criminal faction, while the boss's right-hand man tries to decide where his loyalties lie. The Coen brothers' Prohibition-era gangster thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Albert Finney, Marcia Gay Harden and John Turturro(n)

programme.title: The Darjeeling Limited
programme.desc: Three brothers drift apart after their father's death. A year later, the eldest arranges for the other two to join him on a soul-searching trip across India to rebuild their relationship and track down their estranged mother. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman and Anjelica Huston(n)

programme.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
programme.desc: A young strait-laced couple stranded by a storm take shelter in an eerie castle, where they are enticed into the weird world of a menagerie of debauched characters - presided over by a mad sex-crazed transvestite scientist - and undergo a startling transformation as they let go of their inhibitions. Cult musical, with Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon, Barry Bostwick and the show's creator Richard O'Brien(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: Two children, one in London the other in Madrid, are visited in the night by the same mysterious ghostly figure, whom they appear to be unconsciously willing into existence. The Spanish boy's mother turns to the church for help in dealing with the intrusion, while the English girl's father employs a more scientific approach. Horror, starring Clive Owen, Pilar Lopez de Ayala and Carice van Houten

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: Reporters Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are sacked for missing out on a massive scoop about the theft of jewellery from famous British fashion designer Lady Holiday. To try to re-establish their reputations, the duo and Gonzo fly to London to see if they can track down the culprit. Comedy, with the voices of Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with cameo appearances by John Cleese, Diana Rigg, Charles Grodin and Peter Ustinov

programme.title: Flight of the Navigator
programme.desc: A boy mysteriously disappears in 1978, and is found eight years later, having not aged a day. He escapes being experimented on by government scientists by taking off in a crashed alien spaceship. With the help of the robot pilot, he tries to find out what has happened to him and if he can get back home. Sci-fi adventure, starring Joey Cramer and Veronica Cartwright, with the voice of Paul Reubens

programme.title: Chalet Girl
programme.desc: A 19-year-old skateboarding champion gives up the sport as she struggles to support herself and her father. She gets a job working in a ski resort, where she feels out of her comfort zone in high society, but she finds a way to put her old skills to good use by competing in a prestigious snowboarding competition. Comedy, with Felicity Jones, Ed Westwick and Bill Nighy

programme.title: The Princess Diaries
programme.desc: An ordinary teenager discovers she is descended from royal stock and her grandmother is a queen. However, when this formidable regal lady insists she learn to behave like a princess, life suddenly becomes very complicated. Family comedy, starring Anne Hathaway, Julie Andrews, Heather Matarazzo and Hector Elizondo

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A scientist and four members of his crew develop superhuman powers after exposure to cosmic radiation on a mission to study an energy storm in space. Unfortunately, one of them chooses to use his new-found abilities for evil purposes, compelling the others to join forces to stop him. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis and Julian McMahon

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: A fugitive is left for dead by his treacherous followers on a dangerous world full of lethal predators. He lures bounty hunters to the planet in the hope of killing them and stealing their spacecraft, but finds himself forced to work with them against an attack by the monsters at the top of the food chain. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Katee Sackhoff

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A thwarted Nazi experiment lands the Allies with an unexpected visitor from another dimension in the form of a bright-red demon. A secretive US government agency fosters the little devil and he grows up to be its crucial weapon against the forces of darkness - but the re-emergence of the sinister wizard Rasputin proves a challenge even for him. Action fantasy based on the comic-book series, with Ron Perlman, John Hurt, Selma Blair and Karel Roden

programme.title: Case 39
programme.desc: A social worker adopts a girl whose parents abused and ultimately tried to kill her. However, she finds they may have had good reason for wanting to get rid of the child, who has supernatural powers that she puts to murderous use. As the bodies pile up, the adoptive mother struggles to convince anyone of the girl's evil nature. Horror, with Renee Zellweger, Jodelle Ferland and Ian McShane

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: A cataclysm leaves prehistoric animals Manny, Sid and Diego lost at sea on a drifting iceberg. They try to find a way to return home, embarking on a journey that leads to an encounter with a ferocious band of piratical creatures. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Krull
programme.desc: Villainous monster the Beast invades a magical land, where his henchmen kidnap a princess the night before her wedding. Her fiance sets out in search of a mythical weapon to rescue her, aided by a band of thieves, a wise old hermit, a bumbling wizard and a mysterious Cyclops. Fantasy adventure, starring Ken Marshall, Lysette Anthony, Freddie Jones, Francesca Annis, Robbie Coltrane and Liam Neeson

programme.title: The Jewel of the Nile
programme.desc: A novelist travels to the Middle East to become a sheik's official biographer, only to end up being held hostage by him. Her lover joins forces with an old enemy to rescue her, but they get drawn into the hunt for a mysterious ancient treasure that has a connection to an eccentric holy man. Comedy adventure sequel to Romancing the Stone, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: A scientist working on synthetic skin is horribly disfigured and left for dead by a criminal gang. Now unable to feel pain, he continues his research, creating artificial faces that will last for only a short time. He uses these disguises to aid him in taking revenge on those who mutilated him - while also using a mask of his own face to see the girlfriend who thinks he died. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson and Frances McDormand

programme.title: The Anomaly
programme.desc: A traumatised former soldier wakes up in a strange place with no memory of how he got there, and immediately finds his life is in danger. As he goes on the run, he finds more sections of his memory being erased and discovers a sinister conspiracy. Sci-fi thriller, directed by and starring Noel Clarke, with Ian Somerhalder and Brian Cox

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: Psychologist Kris Kelvin is sent to investigate the mysterious events that have taken place on a space station that is orbiting a remote planet and discovers that all but three of the 85 crew are dead and the survivors cannot - or will not - explain what has happened. Andrei Tarkovsky's sci-fi mystery, starring Donatas Banionis, Natalya Bondarchuk and Yuri Yarvet. In Russian(n)

programme.title: Muppet Treasure Island
programme.desc: A youngster finds a treasure map and joins an expedition searching for a famous buccaneer's lost treasure on an unexplored island. However, their mission falls foul of a band of pirates hiding out among the crew. Musical comedy based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders and Kevin Bishop alongside the puppet characters(n)

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: An earthquake forces a bear from the Peruvian jungle to start a new life in London. He finds modern Britain to be very different from the stories told to him by his aunt, but makes a new home with a kindly family. However, a sinister taxidermist intends to turn him into a museum exhibit. Comedy based on Michael Bond's series of children's books, starring Hugh Bonneville, Sally Hawkins and Nicole Kidman, with the voice of Ben Whishaw(n)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill(n)

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller, starring Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello and John C Reilly(n)

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: A scientist working to develop artificial intelligence is assassinated, but his death provides the breakthrough he and his colleagues needed, as his own mind is uploaded into a computer system. Granted extraordinary knowledge, he begins planning to change the world for the better - with potentially horrific consequences for the human race. Sci-fi drama, starring Johnny Depp, Rebecca Hall and Morgan Freeman(n)

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: Premiere. Five college friends spending a weekend in a remote cabin fear for their lives when they accidentally blunder onto a conspiracy theorist's land. The situation grows far more terrifying when a UFO crash lands nearby, and the surviving occupant comes looking for human prey. Sci-fi horror, starring Brittany Allen and Freddie Stroma(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Kind-hearted John-Boy gives up a date with a beautiful woman to accompany an elderly Scottish lady on the most important journey of her life

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy's peace and quiet is disrupted by an old schoolfriend who desperately needs his help. Sissy Spacek guest stars

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Jonathan plan to show the boys a few things about the responsibilities of adulthood, but the tables are swiftly turned. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Walnut Grove school children take tests to prepare them for the next year, but after Andy fails, his parents ask Nels to tutor him. However, he advises him to get ahead by dishonest means

programme.title: Expecting a Miracle
programme.desc: A married couple with problems starting a family decide to have a romantic break in Mexico, but en route their car breaks down in a small hamlet. Stranded for a few days, they are drawn into the preparations for a fiesta - and experiencing the villagers' contented way of life gives them a new perspective on their troubles. Drama, with Jason Priestley, Teri Polo and Cheech Marin

programme.title: A Thousand Heroes
programme.desc: Tense drama based on the real-life story of a heroic pilot forced to make a spectacular emergency landing in Iowa, and the ground staff's attempts to save all 296 people on board his aircraft. Charlton Heston, James Coburn and Richard Thomas star

programme.title: Blessed Stranger: After Flight 111
programme.desc: A woman whose teenage daughter was lost in a plane crash in Nova Scotia hopes to find evidence that she somehow survived. A fisherman who was involved in the rescue effort retrieved the missing girl's sweater from the wreckage, and the desperate mother visits him in the hope that he can help find her. Drama, with Kate Nelligan, Hugh Thompson, Stacy Smith and Janet Kidder

programme.title: The Triumph
programme.desc: An idealistic teacher gives up his small-town job in favour of a new life in New York, where he takes up the challenge of working in one of the country's toughest schools. Fact-based drama, starring Matthew Perry, with Ernie Hudson and Hannah Hodson

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is rushed to hospital with pneumonia, leaving the rest of the family to cope with their financial hardship

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary mistakenly jumps to the conclusion that her mother has fallen for Chris, the handsome handyman they have hired to finish work on the house

programme.title: Outrage
programme.desc: An affluent Californian community is terrorised by a street gang, until one of the residents starts fighting back. Fact-based crime drama, starring Robert Culp and Marlyn Mason

programme.title: A Walton Easter
programme.desc: The children of the mountain clan are grown up and living separate lives by the 1960s. They all return to their old mountain homestead to celebrate parents John and Olivia's 40th wedding anniversary. Drama spin-off from the TV series, starring Ralph Waite, Michael Learned, Richard Thomas and Lisa Harrison

programme.title: Three Weeks, Three Kids
programme.desc: A couple with three children plan a three-week holiday without the kids, and the wife's mother offers to look after them. However, she has an ulterior motive - she thinks her carefree younger daughter could do with a lesson in adult responsibility, and arranges for the youngsters to be left in her care. Comedy, starring Anna Chlumsky and Warren Christie

programme.title: The Jazz Singer

Drama, starring Treat Williams and Nancy Travis

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd

John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's classic novel, with Julie Christie, Alan Bates, Terence Stamp and Peter Finch

programme.desc: A look back at the historical events of the queen's reign(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A widow enlists John-Boy's help in her efforts to win the affections of a farm worker who is hoping to settle down(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy catches his friend Yancy Tucker stealing two chickens and agonises over whether to report him. With Richard Thomas and Robert Donner(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Carrie becomes heartsick for her father when he and Jonathan take jobs on a telephone crew and must be away for weeks, so invents an invisible friend(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Carrie invents an invisible friend when she has no one to play with and goes adventuring(n)

programme.title: Return to Zero
programme.desc: A couple expecting their first child are devastated by the news that the child will be stillborn. They resort to alcohol and infidelity to cope with their grief, ultimately destroying their marriage. However, when they learn they are expecting another child, they anxiously face an uncertain future. Fact-based drama, with Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina and Connie Nielsen(n)

programme.title: God Bless the Child
programme.desc: Poverty and hardship force a single mother and her seven-year-old daughter to move into a shelter for the homeless. Drama, starring Mare Winningham, Grace Johnston and Dorian Harewood(n)

programme.title: Going Home
programme.desc: A woman sacrifices her promising career to care for her elderly father, but soon realises she made the right choice. Drama, starring Jason Robards and Sherry Stringfield(n)

programme.title: No Higher Love
programme.desc: A woman's joy at a long-awaited pregnancy is shattered by the discovery that she has an inoperable tumour, forcing her to put aside her grief and make provisions for her baby and husband. Drama, starring Katey Sagal, Annabeth Gish and Tom Irwin(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is given extra tuition by a 16-year-old genius, and in return, provides the gifted youngster with a taste of the family life he has never experienced(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A spate of burglaries in Walnut Grove prompts Laura and Andy to become amateur detectives. The duo set out to catch the culprit in the act, but their efforts only end up making matters worse after Charles is caught in one of their traps(n)

programme.title: Resting Place
programme.desc: The proposed burial of a black soldier killed in Vietnam in an all-white Deep South cemetery arouses racial tension and opposition within the community. An army officer tries to persuade the town's residents to accept the fact of the dead soldier's equality, but in the process he stumbles on information hinting at a suspicious death. Drama, starring John Lithgow, Morgan Freeman and Richard Bradford(n)

programme.title: A Day for Thanks on Walton's Mountain
programme.desc: As Thanksgiving approaches, Elizabeth resolves to gather the entire Walton family together again for an old-fashioned celebration - but struggles to persuade everyone to attend. Drama, starring Kami Cotler, Ralph Waite, Jon Walmsley and Ellen Corby(n)

programme.title: A Soldier's Love Story
programme.desc: A sergeant in the US Army serving in Afghanistan becomes a father figure to a lonely boy who writes to him from California. When the soldier returns from his tour of duty, he visits the youngster and begins to develop a relationship with the lad's divorced mother. Romantic drama, with Lori Loughlin and Johnny Messner(n)

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: A former Cornish military captain, now a member of Parliament, is drawn into the war with France while his son falls in with smugglers. Historical drama, based on Winston Graham's novels, starring John Bowe and Mel Martin, and featuring a young Ioan Gruffudd in one of his earliest roles(n)

programme.title: Blessings
programme.desc: A woman looks back over the events of her long life, recalling how she met and lost her husband, and the day she encountered a handyman who became a firm friend. Drama, starring Mary Tyler Moore, Liam Waite and Kathleen Quinlan(n)

programme.title: Runaway Car
programme.desc: The accelerator on a woman's car jams, leaving its passengers facing a terrifying ordeal as they attempt to find a way of bringing the vehicle to a stop. Action thriller, with Judge Reinhold, Nina Siemaszko, Brian Hooks and Leon

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Kind-hearted John-Boy gives up a date with a beautiful woman to accompany an elderly Scottish lady on the most important journey of her life

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy's peace and quiet is disrupted by an old schoolfriend who desperately needs his help. Sissy Spacek guest stars

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Jonathan plan to show the boys a few things about the responsibilities of adulthood, but the tables are swiftly turned. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Walnut Grove school children take tests to prepare them for the next year, but after Andy fails, his parents ask Nels to tutor him. However, he advises him to get ahead by dishonest means

programme.title: Expecting a Miracle
programme.desc: A married couple with problems starting a family decide to have a romantic break in Mexico, but en route their car breaks down in a small hamlet. Stranded for a few days, they are drawn into the preparations for a fiesta - and experiencing the villagers' contented way of life gives them a new perspective on their troubles. Drama, with Jason Priestley, Teri Polo and Cheech Marin

programme.title: A Thousand Heroes
programme.desc: Tense drama based on the real-life story of a heroic pilot forced to make a spectacular emergency landing in Iowa, and the ground staff's attempts to save all 296 people on board his aircraft. Charlton Heston, James Coburn and Richard Thomas star

programme.title: Blessed Stranger: After Flight 111
programme.desc: A woman whose teenage daughter was lost in a plane crash in Nova Scotia hopes to find evidence that she somehow survived. A fisherman who was involved in the rescue effort retrieved the missing girl's sweater from the wreckage, and the desperate mother visits him in the hope that he can help find her. Drama, with Kate Nelligan, Hugh Thompson, Stacy Smith and Janet Kidder

programme.title: The Triumph
programme.desc: An idealistic teacher gives up his small-town job in favour of a new life in New York, where he takes up the challenge of working in one of the country's toughest schools. Fact-based drama, starring Matthew Perry, with Ernie Hudson and Hannah Hodson

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is rushed to hospital with pneumonia, leaving the rest of the family to cope with their financial hardship

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary mistakenly jumps to the conclusion that her mother has fallen for Chris, the handsome handyman they have hired to finish work on the house

programme.title: Outrage
programme.desc: An affluent Californian community is terrorised by a street gang, until one of the residents starts fighting back. Fact-based crime drama, starring Robert Culp and Marlyn Mason

programme.title: A Walton Easter
programme.desc: The children of the mountain clan are grown up and living separate lives by the 1960s. They all return to their old mountain homestead to celebrate parents John and Olivia's 40th wedding anniversary. Drama spin-off from the TV series, starring Ralph Waite, Michael Learned, Richard Thomas and Lisa Harrison

programme.title: Three Weeks, Three Kids
programme.desc: A couple with three children plan a three-week holiday without the kids, and the wife's mother offers to look after them. However, she has an ulterior motive - she thinks her carefree younger daughter could do with a lesson in adult responsibility, and arranges for the youngsters to be left in her care. Comedy, starring Anna Chlumsky and Warren Christie
